attributes.action: Please make First Aid part of the National Curriculum to be taught in ALL schools
attributes.additional_details: This petition is campaigning for Basic First Aid to be taught as part of the National Curriculum. Please sign this WILL save hundreds if not thousands of lives which are sadly lost every year because of a lack of Basic First Aid knowledge. You never know when you or a loved one will need this knowledge to save a life. Do the right thing and help get Basic First Aid taught in EVERY school to EVERY child.
